About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hello there, my name is Rahul Maharjan and this is my website.

Interests/Hobbies

Things I do for fun.

I consider myself to be an avid gamer, I love to play games like God of War or Smash Bros. I also like to go running and play basketball. I was also an avid member of my school's Model UN club.

Prior Work

What I used to do.

I currently work as a tutor for Kumon, where I teach math and reading to kids. I also have volunteered at organizations such as AFAC and Aspire.

School

What I learn.

I graduated from Yorktown High School as the class of 2019. I am now currently a freshman at George Mason University with a computer science degree.
